name: leveldb.org
description: This is the source code for [leveldb.org](leveldb.org).

scripts.start: npm run watch-styles & npm run watch-jade & npm run server
scripts.git-co: git checkout gh-pages && git reset --hard origin/master
scripts.prep: npm run build-styles && npm run build-jade && cp -r ./assets/static/* . && echo "leveldb.org" > CNAME
scripts.git-push: git push origin gh-pages --force && git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npm run git-co && npm run prep && npm run git-commit && npm run git-push
